item.title: Create A Simple Discord Bot
item.description: This guide will show you how to create a simple bot for discord on a ubuntu 16 server. Our bot will be very basic and will reply with a message saying pong when we a user types ping. Install nodejs and npm Create the bot Generate token Invite the bot Install node.js and npm We need to install node.js and npm and we can do so by typing the following commands in your command line.
